submissionCompletedText.text:
Your metadata has now been submitted to the EBRAINS curation team.

You will receive a confirmation for your submission on email and one of our curators will get back to you with further instructions. If you want to keep a local backup of your metadata, you can download the metadata as a JSON file using the button below. The json file contains the metadata in a machine-readable format and if you at some point need to make changes to the metadata, you can upload it to the wizard, make modifications and resubmit.
